Using [[Complete Body — Susanoo]] as a medium, the user can fire a multitude of fireballs from the construct's mouth. The fireballs vary in size, capable of becoming as large as a [[Tailed Beast]]. As the technique doesn't explode on impact, the fireballs can be repelled with enough force. By launching the technique into the sky, it creates thunderclouds, making it possible to use [[Kirin]].
